m_szDocSumamry: Login Sign up Search Expert Search Quick Search Patents/Apps Non-Patent Literature SEARCH RESEARCH MPEP 2.0 TOOLS & RESOURCES ACCLAIM IP HELP Title: Method and apparatus for acquiring image for vehicle European Patent Application EP2860063 Kind Code: A1 Abstract: The apparatus includes an input (130, 141, 142) that receives a user input and at least one imaging device (110) that acquires an external image data of the vehicle. A sensor (120) that includes at least one sensor is configured to confirm a state of the vehicle and a display (140) is configured to display a region around the vehicle
